trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Canterbury
There were no other sightings in Canterbury on or around November 30th 1996
Summary: Returning home from work at 12:30-1:30AM witness saw a very large orange/reddish ball moving slowly over a field.
divs: sighting detailsthe witness was coming home after work at 12:30-1:30am. as he turned into his driveway, he noticed a very large orange\reddish ball moving slowly over an adjacent field. he shut of his trucks engine, heard no sound. he "flicked" his headlights, no response. the object was estimated to be the size of his house. the object was heading south so he started his truck and proceeded back down his driveway to get a better look. it was heading southerly, it slowly picked up speed, turned south east. he thinks the object was 200 meters above the field.
